SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
Class that defines all the characteristics and methods of the Client Controller All the main parameters for the client to operate are saved here Define the exchange of information between the view and the connection to the server

  • Method Details

    • onSelect

      public void onSelect()
      Method called by the server to ask for the selection of the item cards to the client Change turn phase and print the board to the client's view

    • onInsert

      public void onInsert()
      Method called by the server to ask for the insertion of the item cards to the client Change turn phase and print the client's bookshelf to the client's view

    • setSelectedTiles

      public void setSelectedTiles(ArrayList<Integer> coords)
      Method called by the view to update the Tiles selected from the player (After the input check)
      Parameters:
      coords - Coordinates of the Tiles selected from the player

    • getSelectedTiles

      public Map<Integer,ItemCard> getSelectedTiles()
      Method to get the selected tiles from the view for the insert method
      Returns:
      the Tiles selected by the players during the select phase

    • onBoardChanged

      public void onBoardChanged(ItemCard[][] newBoard)
      Method called by the server when the board change Save the new Board and print it to the client's view
      Parameters:
      newBoard - is the updated board from the server

    • onBookshelfChanged

      public void onBookshelfChanged(String nickname, ItemCard[][] newBookshelf)
      Method called by the server when the nickname's client bookshelf change Save the new bookshelf and print all the bookshelves to the client's view
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the client whose bookshelf changed
      newBookshelf - The updated bookshelf

    • onError

      public void onError(String error)
      Method called by the server when an error occurred, Print the error to the client's view
      Parameters:
      error - String in which is saved the error

    • onPlayerNumber

      public void onPlayerNumber(List<String> notAvailableNames)
      Methods called by the server to the first player of the game asking the number of players he wants in the game Set selectNumberOfPlayers to true, so the Cli can accept the corresponding command
      Parameters:
      notAvailableNames - the names of the name already in existence

    • onSavedGame

      public void onSavedGame(List<String> savedGames)
      Method called by the server to ask the player if he wants to resume a game
      Parameters:
      savedGames - all the not finished games with the user nickname as a nickname of a player

    • onCommonGoalCreated

      public void onCommonGoalCreated(Integer comGoalID, Integer score)
      Method called by the server when a CommonGoal is created Print the CommonGoal to the client's view
      Parameters:
      comGoalID - ID that references to the defined CommonGoal
      score - Value of the CommonGoal if completed

    • onCommonGoalDone

      public void onCommonGoalDone(String nickname, int[] newValue)
      Method called by the server when one CommonGoal is done by the player nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - name of the player
      newValue - new value of the CommonGoal after a player has done it

    • onPlayerScore

      public void onPlayerScore(int score)
      Called when the client comes back to an existing game with him into.
      Parameters:
      score - done during the game by the client.

    • onBookshelfCompleted

      public void onBookshelfCompleted(String nickname)
      Just notifies the client that someone has completed their bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player that has just completed his bookshelf.

    • onPersGoalCreated

      public void onPersGoalCreated(String newValue)
      Method called by the server when creating the PersonalGoal of the player Create from the json file the PersonalGoal and print it to the client's view
      Parameters:
      newValue - String that defines the PersonalGoal

    • onChangeTurn

      public void onChangeTurn(String nickname)
      Method called by the server after the end of a player's turn If it is my turn I update myTurn and print to the client's view that it is the client's turn
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player whose turn is

    • setView

      public void setView(View view)
      Set the view to the client controller on which he will call all the methods
      Parameters:
      view - view on which the client controller will print on

    • startConnection

      public void startConnection(int select, String username, String address, int port)
      Starting the connection with the server using all data from the view Saving the player's username
      Parameters:
      select - 0 for RMI, 1 for Socket
      username - player's username
      address - IP of the server
      port - Port of the server

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard()
      Method called by the client that pass to the server the position of the Tiles selected by the client

    • insertCard

      public void insertCard(ArrayList<ItemCard> selectedCards, int column)
      Method called from the client that pass to the server the Tiles inserted by the client and in which column he wants to put them
      Parameters:
      selectedCards - Tiles selected by the client in order
      column - column where to put the Tiles

    • chatToAll

      public void chatToAll(String message)
      Method called by the client that pass to the server the chat message for all connected players of the game
      Parameters:
      message - String to send to all the connected players

    • chatToPlayer

      public void chatToPlayer(String receiver, String message)
      Method called by the client that pass to the server the chat message for the receiver
      Parameters:
      receiver - player that receives the message
      message - String to send to the receiver

    • chatToMe

      public void chatToMe(String sender, String message)
      Method called by the server to print the message
      Parameters:
      sender - Player that send the message
      message - String sent by the sender

    • getMyNickname

      public String getMyNickname()
      Getter method for the nickname of the player
      Returns:
      the player's nickname

    • getBoard

      public ItemCard[][] getBoard()
      Getter method for the Board
      Returns:
      the Board

    • getPlayersBookshelves

      public Map<String,ItemCard[][]> getPlayersBookshelves()
      Getter method for the Map of the bookshelves
      Returns:
      the Map of all the Bookshelves

    • isMyTurn

      public boolean isMyTurn()
      Getter method to see if it is the players turn
      Returns:
      if it is my turn

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(int players, String gameName)
      Method called by the client only if he is the first connected to the server
      Parameters:
      players - number of players in the game
      gameName - the name for the game to save

    • printWaitingForGame

      public void printWaitingForGame()
      Prints on the view that the number of players to start the game is insufficient, so it is waiting for enough people to start

    • setSavedGame

      public void setSavedGame(boolean wantToSave, String gameName)
      Called after client's decision about saved games.
      Parameters:
      wantToSave - true if he wants to re-start from a saved game.
      gameName - the name of the game he wants to resume.

    • getPlayerComGoal

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getPlayerComGoal()
      Getter method for the Common Goals
      Returns:
      the CommonGoals of the game

    • getMyPoint

      public int getMyPoint()
      Getter method for the client's points
      Returns:
      the client's point

    • getMyPersGoal

      public Map<Integer,HouseItem> getMyPersGoal()
      Getter method for the client's personal goal
      Returns:
      the client's personal goal

    • getPhase

      public TurnPhase getPhase()
      Getter method for the phase turn
      Returns:
      the game's turn phase if it is his turn, NULL all other times

    • isSelectNumberOfPlayers

      public boolean isSelectNumberOfPlayers()
      Getter method to see if you can select the number of players
      Returns:
      true if you can use the @player function on the Cli

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Getter method to se if the game is started
      Returns:
      true if the game is started else false

    • disconnectMe

      public void disconnectMe()
      Method called by the server to disconnect the player

    • gameStarted

      public void gameStarted(ArrayList<String> playersList, boolean gameStarted)
      Method called by the server when the game starts
      Parameters:
      playersList - The List of the players connected to the game
      gameStarted - A Boolean used by the client to check the input of the user

    • gameInterrupted

      public void gameInterrupted()
      Called when the game has been interrupted because there are too many absents.

    • onWinner

      public void onWinner(List<String> winners)
      Method called by the server to print the name(s) of the winner(s)
      Parameters:
      winners - The player(s) tha has/have done the highest number of points

    • getPersGoalValue

      public String getPersGoalValue()
      Getter method for the value of the personal goal
      Returns:
      the value that defines the personal goal

    • onBookshelfRenewed

      public void onBookshelfRenewed(ItemCard[] tilesToAdd, int column, String player)
      Called when there's a bookshelf's update.
      Parameters:
      tilesToAdd - the tiles to be added in the bookshelf.
      column - the column of the bookshelf to put tiles into.
      player - the owner of the just updated bookshelf.

    • onBoardRenewed

      public void onBoardRenewed(Integer[] tilesToRemove)
      Called when there's a board's update.
      Parameters:
      tilesToRemove - the positions of the tiles to be removed from the board.

    • onFinalScores

      public void onFinalScores(LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> finalScores)
      Called at the end of the game to send the final classification to the client.
      Parameters:
      finalScores - an ordered map with players' nicknames and final scores.
